code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with increased mild flatulence, mild diarrhea and Stomach over 3 years. pt is a 42 yr old white F systems analyst. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in her past she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 62 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.

content2.Unmatched: her past she states she has

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:44 yo white F presents with increased mild flatulence and mild diarrhea over 3 years. o:Height 62 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 18, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
